author: Catherine Pulsifer
message: You can adopt the attitude there is nothing you can do, or you can see the challenge as your call to action.
title: Thought of the day

author: Alfred Tennyson
message: The happiness of a man in this life does not consist in the absence but in the mastery of his passions.
title: Thought of the day

author: Margaret Mead
message: Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed people can change the world. Indeed. It is the only thing that ever has.
title: Thought of the day

author: Ovid
message: Let your hook always be cast; in the pool where you least expect it, there will be a fish.
title: Thought of the day
